attributes.action: Begin a full public inquiry in to the Telford child sexual abuse.
attributes.background: A full and open, public inquiry is needed to find out the failings of police, and local government services that were meant to protect the many, many you girl abused I'm the Telford grooming scandal.

rejection.details:
There is already an Independent Inquiry on Child Sexual Abuse. 

The Inquiry has announced that it is considering information from Telford and Wrekin Council as part of its investigation. 

You can find out more about the Inquiry here:

https://www.iicsa.org.uk/
